articles.title: The EU has introduced a new ‘digital’ ID. Here’s what it means for you. - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The European Commission wants to develop an app that would contain the digital version of your identity card.
articles.content:
The European Commission on Thursday unveiled plans to introduce a bloc-wide digital ID.
If approved, the plan would allow people to use an app to prove their identity online, whether that's to verif… [+5983 chars]
